figures.title: Hardware Scaling Trends
figures.description: Historical scaling trends for hardware FLOPS (~60,000x/20yrs), DRAM bandwidth (~100x/20yrs), and interconnect bandwidth (~30x/20yrs) from 2005-2025. Shows exponential growth with fitted trend lines for GPUs (Pentium 4 to B200), memory (GDDR4 to HBM3E), and interconnects (PCIe 2.0 to NVLink 4.0).
